actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to impose a 60-day freeze on prices and rents and direct the President to establish a long-run economic stabilization program.

summary.text: Imposes a sixty-day freeze on prices and rents at levels no higher than those prevailing on March 16, 1973. Directs the President to establish a longrun economic stabilization program for prices, rents, wages, interest rates, and corporate dividends.

titles.title: A bill to impose a 60-day freeze on prices and rents and direct the President to establish a long-run economic stabilization program.
